title: Ticket #3670: Remove testing binaries from tarball release
description:
Get rid of the binaries in release tarball for these:

  • classad_functional_tester
  • classad_version
  • condor_test_match
  • condor_userlog_job_counter
remarks:
2013-Jun-03 16:00:24 by wenger:
As per discussion in today's flightworthy meeting: add a note to the v8.0.0 known bugs list about these binaries being obsolete; actually remove them in v8.0.1 (to avoid cmake changes at this point).

2013-Jun-04 16:03:06 by wenger:
I've added the note to the "known bugs" section in the 8.0 version history, so I'm going to change the target of this ticket to v8.0.1.
check_ins: 2013-Jun-04 15:58   Check-in [35990]: Gittrac #3670: Added a version history note about obsolete binaries that are still in the tarball. (By Kent Wenger )
creator: wenger
